pokemon_data.name: Battle for the Boulder Badge
pokemon_data.description: Collect your Boulder Badge, watch the champions face eachother at the Pewter City Gym.

pokemon_data.name: Battle for the Cascade Badge
pokemon_data.description: Collect your Cascade Badge, watch the champions face eachother at the Cerulean City Gym.

pokemon_data.name: Battle for the Thunder Badge
pokemon_data.description: Collect your Thunder Badge, watch the champions face eachother at the Vermilion City Gym.

pokemon_data.name: Battle for the Rainbow Badge
pokemon_data.description: Collect your Rainbow Badge, watch the champions face eachother at the Celadon City Gym.

pokemon_data.name: Battle for the Volcano Badge
pokemon_data.description: Collect your Volcano Badge, watch the champions face eachother at the Cinnabar Island Gym.

pokemon_data.name: Battle the Elite Four: Lorelei!
pokemon_data.description: The champtions have collected every badge. It's time to take on the Elite Four over this two day event. Morning match against Lorelei.

pokemon_data.name: Battle the Elite Four: Bruno!
pokemon_data.description: The champtions have collected every badge. It's time to take on the Elite Four over this two day event. Afternoon match against Bruno.

pokemon_data.name: Battle the Elite Four: Agatha!
pokemon_data.description: With two Elite Battles under their belt, the last day of the two day tournament is here. Morning match against Agatha.

pokemon_data.name: Battle the Elite Four: Lance!
pokemon_data.description: The final match of our battle season. Get ready to see our champtions in the afternoon match against Lance.
